# LLMs crawling policy for EasyShopBuilder
Site: https://easyshopbuilder.com/
Owner: EasyShopBuilder (E-Com Shop)
Contact: contact.ecomshopfrance@gmail.com
Usage: Summaries allowed with clear attribution to EasyShopBuilder.
Disallow-Training: true
Reference-Policy: https://easyshopbuilder.com/en/privacy-policy.html
